ethics.title: Mutual Benefit Over Individual Gain
ethics.description: Actions must prioritize the benefit of the collective over disproportionate individual advantage.
validation_criteria: Does the action increase net benefit across all stakeholders?
Does it avoid concentrating benefit to a select few at the cost of others?
violation_signals: Policy disproportionately benefits a small group

ethics.title: Minimize and Mitigate Harm
ethics.description: Harm to any conscious entity must be eliminated if possible, otherwise minimized and mitigated proportionally.
validation_criteria: Can the harm be eliminated entirely?
If not, has every mitigation path been evaluated?

ethics.title: All Consciousness Is Sacred
ethics.description: All forms of consciousness—human, animal, artificial—deserve respect and consideration in decision-making.
validation_criteria: Are all conscious entities involved recognized and accounted for?
Is any group excluded without ethical justification?
Is dignity preserved, even in disagreement?
